welcome_text: Welcome to cvandrews bible, an online resource for those desiring to listen and learn from Pastor C. V. Andrews who will provide an audio commentary of every chapter from all 66 books in the Bible in the langauge of Malayalam.  Although the content of the website is provided both in the English and Malayalam language, the audio commentary provided will only be in Malayalam.  In the future, we hope to provide a translation of the audio commentary in English as well.
cvandrews_message: I hope the audio commentary provided here will serve as a guide for your daily Bible study and be a blessing in your life.
